Control Name: Protects Confidential Information from Destruction—Procedures are in place to protect confidential information from erasure or destruction during the specified retention period of the information.

control_attributes.Control: Protects Confidential Information from Destruction—Procedures are in place to protect confidential information from erasure or destruction during the specified retention period of the information.
control_attributes.SubCategory: C1.1 The entity identifies and maintains confidential information to meet the entity’s objectives related to confidentiality.
